articles.description: Josh Tongue and England's seamers struggled for consistency despite moments of brilliance, while Chris Woakes' injury adds yet another dilemma.
articles.title: England vs India: Josh Tongue's moments of magic and erraticness sums up hosts' opening day

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit decides to leave the NFL and return to playing rugby union.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit leaves NFL after 18 months to return to rugby union

articles.description: The story of Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in a fight in the United States.
articles.title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US

articles.description: England pace bowler Chris Woakes looks likely to be ruled out of the remainder of the decisive fifth Test against India after suffering a shoulder injury.
articles.title: England vs India: Chris Woakes set to miss rest of fifth Test after shoulder injury

articles.description: Everton have an offer of £27m rejected for 19-year-old Southampton winger Tyler Dibling.
articles.title: Tyler Dibling: Southampton reject Everton's £27m bid for winger

articles.description: Lottie Woad shoots a level-par first round to lie five shots off the AIG Women's Open lead jointly held by Eri Okayama and Rio Takeda.
articles.title: Women's Open 2025: Lottie Woad five behind Eri Okayama and Rio Takeda

articles.description: Watch Pape Sarr scores from near that halfway line, as Tottenham claimed a 1-0 pre-season victory over Arsenal in the first north London derby outside of the United Kingdom.
articles.title: Arsenal v Tottenham: Pape Sarr scores incredible long-range goal in pre-season win

articles.description: Arsenal will be hoping Viktor Gyokeres can fire them to the Premier League title, but is creating chances an issue for the Gunners?
articles.title: Arsenal: Is creating chances an issue for Gunners?

articles.description: In November McGregor was ordered to pay damages to Nikita Hand, who accused him of raping her in a hotel in Dublin in 2018.
articles.title: Conor McGregor: MMA fighter loses appeal in civil rape case

articles.description: Max Verstappen ends questions about his future by saying that he will definitely stay with Red Bull for next season.
articles.title: Max Verstappen confirms he is staying with Red Bull for 2026 season
